label: Menologion. For the month of Kanun II (January)

work_wit.alt_title: Menologion. Lives of Saints for the month of Kanun II (January)

excerpt.as_written: نبتدي علیٰ إسم الله و بمعونته نكتب

note: Menologion. Lives of Saints for the month of Kanun II (January), beginning on the 1st with a Mimar by St. Cyril, Patriarch of Alexandria, on the circumcision of Our Lord, and ending on the 15th with the life of St. John the Monk who owned a hut and a golden Gospel
